content:
The forces of the South of Ukraine have summed up how many ships the Russian fleet lost in the first month of spring.

This is said inmessagein the telegram channel.

Due to the successful attack of Ukrainian sea dronesHe sankThe Seargie Kotov Watchman.

In addition, the large landing ship "Konstantin Olshansky", the Ivan Hurs reconnaissance ship, as well as large landing ships "Yamal" and "Azov" were damaged in March.

As reported by the Armyinform, the military of the Russian Federation actuallydo not use warshipsAfter the loss of several vessels in the last weeks.

There are no enemy ships in the Black and Azov Seas on Monday.
title: Bad Moon for the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation: How many ships lost the enemy in March
description: This is stated in a message in a telegram. Due to the successful attack of Ukrainian ...
author: Army Inform
